metadata.title: CVE-2020-7014 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The fix for CVE-2020-7009 was found to be incomplete. Elasticsearchversions from 6.7.0 to 6.8.7 and 7.0.0 to 7.6.1 contain a privilegeescalation flaw if an attacker is able to create API keys and alsoauthentication tokens. An attacker who is able to generate an API key andan authentication token can perform a series of steps that result in anauthentication token being generated with elevated privileges.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
